pageContext.claim: “Weissman's a bad guy. He's put a lot of people in jail that shouldn't be in jail.”
pageContext.analysis: It's not clear which defendants Trump is referring to. Andrew Weissman was a prosecutor on Robert Mueller's team who was instrumental in building the case against onetime Trump campaign chairman Paul Manafort, who is now in prison for serial fraud. Weissman also successfully prosecuted mob bosses and Enron executives earlier in his career, to acclaim.
